name: HooX
description:
Your goal will be the highest score before the time runs out! But how  do you make that number go up as fast as it can?

You get score by:

  • Moving, more speed means more points
  • Collecting clocks
  • Grappling into a drone


How to play
  • ESC to adjust the mouse sensitivity, pause or see the scoreboard
  • LMB - Hook (rope)
  • RMB - Hook (pull)
  • WASD - Move
  • Space - Jump
  • Shift - Go faster

Credits:

3D Art: Diego Lima

Programming and Audio: Silas-Silence
